name: Super Splatform
description:
In 2002, Splatform started the jumper genre of games, even if nobody knew it. Now, Super Splatform, a challenging platform jumper with authentic NES style graphics and full chiptune soundtrack, is availabe for all iOS devices!

Make your way through 50 hand-designed levels spread over 5 unique worlds. Ascend from the earth, to the clouds, into space, and beyond the infinite! Also includes an infinite vertical mode, and a pixel-perfect remake of the original Commodore 64 version of Splatform from 2002, which was hidden as an easter egg in the legendary C64DTV plug & play joystick!

- Three control schemes: two thumb, tilt, and swipe, with adjustable sensitivity
- Bouncy chiptune soundtrack: 8 unique NES-style songs
- Find shortcuts through the levels to reduce the number of bounces and earn a gold ranking
- Unlock bonus levels by achieving a silver or gold ranking on all levels
- Collect the coins on each level to unlock extra difficulty levels in Infinite mode
- Game Center enabled: individual leaderboards for every level, and many achievements
- Full iCade support, including all menus - you never need to touch the screen
- Universal app: supports all iPads, iPhone 4 and up, and iPod 4g and up
